Compatibility

Foundation for Apps is designed for and tested on numerous browsers and devices. It's built on some of the latest web technologies. Here's the rundown on what type of compatibility to expect.

Browser/OS The Grid Layout/UI JS
Chrome ✓ ✓ ✓
Firefox ✓ ✓ ✓
Safari ✓ ✓ ✓
Opera 25+ (not Mini) ✓ ✓ ✓
IE11 ✓ ✓ ✓
IE10 ✓ ✓ ✓
IE9 & ↓ χ χ χ
iOS (iPhone) ✓ ✓ ✓
iOS (iPad) ✓ ✓ ✓
Android 4 (Tablet & Phone) ✓ ✓ ✓
Android 2 (Tablet & Phone) χ χ χ
Windows Phone 8+ ✔ ✔ ✔
Surface Tablet ✔ ✔ ✔
